name: Alabama 3
description: '''Alabama 3''' is a British musical group founded in [[Brixton|Brixton, London]], in 1995. Their track "[[Woke Up This Morning]]" was used for the opening credits of the TV series ''[[The Sopranos]]''. In the United States, the band is known as '''A3''', to avoid legal conflict with the [[country music]] band [[Alabama (band)|Alabama]].
